snippet.title: Like a Dragon Gaiden - Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
snippet.description:
Like a Dragon: Gaiden is a new game in the storied Yakuza franchise. Check out this story trailer that follows Kiryu in yet another misadventure, but in an all new series.

#IGN #SoG #Gaming
